analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xb280ab2c126b33a9ff5c9740eb161ece3008ff3b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_contracts/0xb280ab2c126b33a9ff5c9740eb161ece3008ff3b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xb280ab2c126b33a9ff5c9740eb161ece3008ff3b.sol#98) is not in mixedCase
